mapper.select: select id, name, type, price, user_id, create_time from library.collect where id = #{id}
select id, name, type, price, user_id, create_time from library.collect where name like concat('%', #{name}, '%') order by id desc
select id, name, type, price, user_id, create_time from library.collect where name = #{name} order by id desc
select id, name, type, price, user_id, create_time from library.collect where user_id = #{userId}
mapper.insert: insert into library.collect(name, type, price, user_id, create_time) values (#{name}, #{type},#{price},#{userId}, now())
